messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] FYI - Rain Painting
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Holly ... what a creative idea, it sounds like ya ll had such a blast, too!!!    I ll have to remember to break out the food coloring the next time it rains
messages.messageBody:
Hi Holly ...

what a creative idea, it sounds like ya'll had such a blast, too!!! I'll
have to remember to break out the food coloring the next time it rains :)

Pris



> Hello everyone,
>
> I just had to write and tell you all about our afternoon art project
today!
> It is pouring out raining here so I decided for todays art project we
would
> try some "rain painting". To rain paint you put drops of food coloring on
a
> paper plate and go out into the rain with it and it supposedly makes a
> beautiful picture. WELL......we did end up with beautiful pictures and
we
> had fun too. But leave it to me to pick a day when it is REALLY raining
to
> try this project. Lili and I did our food coloring drops and headed out
> into the downpour only to have the rain SPLASH food coloring all over
> us!!!!! Oh well, C'est la vie. <grin> We had a lot of fun doing it but
I
> just thought you might be warned that if you should ever try this project
to
> wear clothes that you don't really care that much about and to be prepared
> to do some scrubbing on your skin when you are done! Lili and I both
look
> like we caught some weird polkadot skin virus! LOL
>
> Holly
>
> ps....Just thought I'd add that even though I ruined my favorite pair of
> shorts....the ruined clothes were worth it! Lili had so much fun!
